entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui `main` Installation Failed #8218
  • Investigate options for full-size Image loading on Android #8217
    .NET 7
  • Investigate: Map Image Height/Width to layout_height/layout_width on Android #8212
    6.0-sr3
  • Handle defaults/themes inside Maui.Core #8210
    .NET 7
  • button not trigger #8206
  • Setup Hot Restart doesn't work #8202
  • Application crashes with "Parent class failed to load, due to: Invalid generic instantiation assembly" #8200
  • On Android, Setting StringContent to HttpRequestMessage, make "GET" request become "POST" request. #8199
  • Add "Topmost" shell/app feature #8198
  • No parameterless constructor defined for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.FrameRenderer #8197
  • maui publish windows 32bit #8196
  • [libc] Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 2 (SEGV_ACCERR) on Latest MAUI #8195
  • RowDefinition Height incorrect #8194
  • Enable Button to have a Content #8191
  • When fetching all contacts in MAUI and iterating through it, it takes a lot of time(>30s for around 1500 contacts) #8189
  • In MVVM mode, the Android collectionView does not update the UI properly #8187

Closed

  • Test bug #8213
  • Button isn't clicking #8214
  • maybe this test? let's try again #8211
  • SQL Server pre-login handshake failed Android 5,6,8.1 #6859
  • Html from Local File in Windows #5523
    6.0-servicing
  • test.... #8209
  • Another test #8208
  • Pretending to be a partner test issue #8207
  • XamlC should issue a warning when bindable property is marked as obsolete #8048
  • [Android] Initial Layout of CollectionView Items on Device Tests is incorrect #7910
    6.0-sr2
  • Android Button on template currently not resizing when text changes #8071
    6.0-sr2
  • IsVisible doesn't work anymore #8044
    6.0-sr2
  • Button CornerRadius does not work yet #7626
    6.0-sr2
  • LinearGradientBrush overflow button making CornerRadius invisible #7488
    6.0-sr2

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply template values for project item templates #8220
    blocker, area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr2
  • Wait to fire nav events until page exists #8219
  • Measure Images in FlexLayout at full size #8216
  • Make sure the AutoImports.props is only included once per .NET version #8204
    area/single project ☝️, blocker, 6.0-sr2
  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄
  • [Windows] Pending changes to correctly updating WinUI properties via resources #8193
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix rendering GraphicsView rendering issue on Windows #8192
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr2
  • Clean up whitespace #8188
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Merge most updates required for net7 to main #8205
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update FabricBot partner list #8215
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix for #5523 MauiWebView not loading local files on Windows #7672
    platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, 6.0-sr2
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1210.39 to 1.0.1245.22 #8055
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Use FabricBot to label partner issues instead of custom GitHub action #8181
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix issue not rendering Border background using a Shadow #7695
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • Resize star rows/columns _only_ during Arrange, if necessary #8190
    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • Add the Microsoft.Maui.Dispatching using #8162
    area/dispatching, 6.0-sr2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [X] Warn on setting Obsolete properties from Xaml #8111
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Revert recent changes to fix Layout issues #8136
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, fatal, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Correctly return the value from Focus method #7694
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix issue using gradients in Button with Corner Radius #7666
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-sr2
  • Make implicit package refs privateassets=all #8064
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • [Tizen] Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #8133
    area/layout 🔲, platform/tizen

Updated

  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix issue clipping ImageButton #7724
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr2
  • Fixup Flyout Template Parts #8022
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0-sr2
  • Handler allocation tests #8177
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix BackgroundColor property issue on SearchBar #7794
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-sr2
  • [Tizen] Update default Shell Flyout behavior #8134
    area/shell 🐢
  • Make VisualElement.ZIndexProperty BP public #8184
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982
    .NET 7
